member.name: T:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl
member.summary: The Ajax Map Control is a javascript controlled map that is able to refresh the map without the whole webpage has to do a roundtrip to the server.

remarks.para: This webcontrol is tested with both IE and FireFox.

The webcontrol creates a client-side javascript object named after the ClientID of this control and appends "Obj" to it. Below are a list of some of the properties and methods of the client-side object. The and client-side events are also is parsing a reference to this object.

item.description: World coordinate of the left side of the current view
World coordinate of the top of the current view
Gets a center point object with the current view (use the .x and .y properties of the returned object for the coordinates)
The current zoom level of the map (map width)
The amount to zoom on a zoom-in event (negative values equals zoom out)
Reference to the map box element

member.name: M:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the

member.summary: Returns the result of the callback event that targets

member.summary: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the method.

member.name: M:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: Sends server control content to a provided HtmlTextWriter object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
member.param: The HtmlTextWriter object that receives the server control content.

member.summary: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering

member.summary: Returns a Url to the map

member.name: M:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.GenerateClientScripts
member.summary: Registers the client-side scripts and creates an initialize script for the current map

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.ZoomSpeed
member.summary: Sets the speed which the zoom is (lower = faster). The default value is 15

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.FadeSpeed
member.summary: Sets the speed of the fade (lower = faster). The default value is 10

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.OnViewChange
member.summary: Client-side method to call when map view have changed

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.OnViewChanging
member.summary: Client-side method to call when map are starting to update

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.OnClickEvent
member.summary: Gets or sets the clientside method to call when custom click-event is active.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.ClickEventPropertyName
member.summary: Gets the name of the clientside ClickEvent property on the map object.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.ToogleClickEventMethodName
member.summary: Gets the name of the clientside ToogleClickEvent method to enable or disable the custom click-event on the map object.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.DisableClickEventMethodName
member.summary: Gets the name of the clientside DisableClickEvent method to disable the custom click-event on the map object.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.EnableClickEventMethodName
member.summary: Gets the name of the clientside EnableClickEvent method to enable the custom click-event on the map object.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.UseCache
member.summary: Sets whether the control should use the http cache or call a specific maphandler

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.StatusBarText
member.summary: Text shown on the map status bar.

remarks.para: Use [X] and [Y] to display cursor position in world coordinates and [ZOOM] for displaying the zoom value.
The default value is "[X], [Y] - Map width=[ZOOM]"

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.ResponseFormat
member.summary: Formatting of the callback response used when is false.

remarks.para: Use [X] and [Y] for center position, [ZOOM] for zoom value, [WIDTH] for image width and [WIDTH] for image height. These values will automatically be replaced by the current values. The return-result should correspond to the url of a maphandler that renders the map from these values

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.DisplayStatusBar
member.summary: Specifies whether the statusbar is visible or not.

member.name: P:SharpMap.Web.UI.Ajax.AjaxMapControl.Map
member.summary: The that is to be rendered in the control
